-- | Class for types with an "empty" value.
--   
--   Class for types with an <a>empty</a> value.
@package empty
@version 1.0


-- | Class for types with an <a>empty</a> value.
module Data.Empty
class Empty a
empty :: (Empty a) => a
instance Empty (ZipList a)
instance Empty (Maybe a)
instance Empty [a]
instance Empty ()
